name: Pando
description:
This is the interactive fiction-alized mystery about the largest and oldest living being on our planet. Will you be able to solve it?

Originally for Stanford CS377A

Before  and after you play, pls record and  post in comments or email ( alli at stanford.edu)

1.How much do you care about our national parks? 1-5   (5 is the most )

2. How much do you care about our environment? 1-5 

3. How much do you care about sustainability? 1-5  

4. Will try to support sustainable practices and products 1-5

*written by Princess Buttercup

**All artwork owned and represented by their respective artists via embedded links.
